metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2782 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in Open-source ARJ archiver 3.10.22 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code viaa crafted ARJ archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

arj - 3.10.22-13
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: arj package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.10.22-13').
